commit.message:
tree-ssa-loop-im: simplify casts in comparators

	* tree-ssa-loop-im.c (sort_bbs_in_loop_postorder_cmp): Simplify casts
	from 'const void *'.
	(sort_locs_in_loop_postorder_cmp): Likewise.

From-SVN: r274011

+	from 'const void *'.
+	(sort_locs_in_loop_postorder_cmp): Likewise.
